item.description:
Tuesdays Night Dinner at Tudo Na Brasa, 414 Main St, Woburn, MA 01801 tel (781) 938-0101
TARGET AUDIENCE: All Members that enjoy Dining Out
Note: you can park in the big free lot behind CVS across from the Restaurant.

BY MBTA (the T) -Convenient to Route 134 bus line from Wellington Station (orange line) and North Woburn/ Woburn Center.

This place is so yummie I have to eat here again! Also, close to the Movie Theater.
A really good inexpensive Brazilian Food Dinner so load up your plate for just $6.95 per pound!----It is sooooo yummie!

Do not miss out! Enjoy.
Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: Its a small place you cannot miss me (Biagio) will snag a table
item.name: Tuesdays Dinner -Pre Movie
